products.title: Podium Blackout Midnight Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Podium Blackout Midnight Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £20.95 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This chic pattern will make a bold graphic statement thanks to its interplay of horizontal lines. Contrasting shades of grey give this streamlined print an intriguing depth and will add a sleek, masculine edge to your space. The podium Midnight Blackout Roller Blind is created from durable blackout fabric to help you maintain your peace and privacy in a swift and simple motion using the sidewinder chain.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1953 Fabric Colour: Midnight Material: 100% Polyester Lining: White Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Podium Haze (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Podium Haze (Blackout) Blackout Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.productdescription:
Min Width: 600mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 450mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.

products.title: Podium Blackout Midnight Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Podium Blackout Midnight Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £163.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Upgrade to the Podium Midnight Blackout Electric Roller Blind and benefit from a host of convenient features. This blind boasts an eye-catching contemporary pattern in tones of grey that is sure to streamline the look of your space. The blackout fabric gives you excellent light control and completely shuts out exterior light at the touch of a button thanks to the exceptional electric design.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1953 Fabric Colour: Midnight Material: 100% Polyester Lining: White Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
